metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated

content.json:
# SEEN Manage and monitor
## ðŸ‘€ Security End-user Notification

parameters.name: ListLogicApps
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.logic/workflows"
| where properties.definition.parameters.ProjectName.defaultValue == "SEEN"
| project id

content.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.logic/workflows"
| where properties.definition.parameters.ProjectName.defaultValue == "SEEN"
| extend Version = properties.definition.parameters.ModuleVersion.defaultValue
| extend State = properties.state
| extend Action = iif( State=="Enabled", "disable", "enable")
content.title: Enable the modules you want to use

armActionContext.description:
# Actions can potentially modify resources.
## Please use caution and include a confirmation message in this description when authoring this command.

armActionContext.title: You are about to ["Action"] ["name"]
armActionContext.description:
### Review the following actions before confirming

You want to **["Action"]** the logic app **["name"]**.

Note that you will need to refresh the workbook to see the updated status.

content.json:
### SEEN Configuration

Edit the settings and click **Save the configuration** once you are done. 

|Setting|Explanation|
|---|---|
|Mail From|The user principalname of the account you want to send the notifications from|
|Time Zone|The time zone used to display the activity time in the notifications|
|Test Email|The email to whom the notifications are sent when the modules are in Test Mode|
|Suppor Email|The email address listed as a point of contact for questions and support in the notifications|
|Support Phone|The phone number listed as a point of contact for questions and support in the notifications|

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.label: Time Zone
parameters.query:
let ListTZ = datatable(TimeZone:string) content.json:
### MFA Module

Notify the end-users when MFA methods get created, updated or deleted on their accounts.

|Setting|Explanation|
|---|---|
|Test Mode|When the module is set in test mode, it will not send the notifications to the end-users but to only to **{mailFrom}**|
|Email Subject|The subject line for the MFA activities notification| 
|Copy to Manager|When enabled, sends a copy to the user's manager if it is defined in Azure AD| 
|BCC|Email address to who the email will be BCCed to. Only one email address is supported| 
|Include Guests|Also notify guest accounts (Azure B2B users) in your tenant|

parameters.name: mfa_testMode
parameters.label: Test Mode

parameters.name: mfa_ccManager
parameters.label: Copy to Manager

parameters.name: mfa_includeGuests
parameters.label: Include Guests

content.json:
### TAP Module

Notify the end-users when TAP get provisionned on their accounts.

|Setting|Explanation|
|---|---|
|Test Mode|When the module is set in test mode, it will not send the notifications to the end-users but to only to **{mailFrom}**|
|Email Subject|The subject line for the MFA activities notification| 
|Copy to Manager|When enabled, sends a copy to the user's manager if it is defined in Azure AD| 
|BCC|Email address to who the email will be BCCed to. Only one email address is supported| 
|Inlcude TAP Usage|Also notify users when TAP are being used|

parameters.name: tap_testMode
parameters.label: Test Mode

parameters.name: tap_ccManager
parameters.label: Copy to Manager

parameters.name: tap_includeUsage
parameters.label: Inlcude TAP Usage

armActionContext.title: Update SEEN configuration
armActionContext.description:
### Review the following settings before confirming

|Global Settings ||
|---|---|
|Mail From|{mailFrom}|
|Time Zone|{timeZone}|
|Test Email|{testEmail}|
|Support Email|{supportEmail}|
|Support Phone|{supportPhone}|


|MFA Module ||
|---|---|
|Test Mode|{mfa_testMode:label}|
|Email Subject|{mfa_subject}|
|Copy Manager|{mfa_ccManager:label}|
|BCC|{mfa_bcc}|
|Include Guests|{mfa_includeGuests}|

|TAP Module ||
|---|---|
|Test Mode|{tap_testMode:label}|
|Email Subject|{tap_subject}|
|Copy Manager|{tap_ccManager:label}|
|BCC|{tap_bcc}|
|Include Guests|{tap_includeUsage}|

Refresh the workbook once the change is confirmed.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "WORKFLOWS/RUNS/ACTIONS"
| where resource_workflowName_s =~ "SEEN-SendNotification"
| where Resource == "RESPONSE"
| where status_s == "Succeeded"
| where isnotempty(trackedProperties_Tracking_s)
| project TimeGenerated, Status = trackedProperties_EmailStatus_d, Module = trackedProperties_Tracking_s,  Subject = trackedProperties_EmailSubject_s, Sender = trackedProperties_EmailFrom_s , Recipient = trackedProperties_EmailRecipient_s
content.title: List of email notifications
content.noDataMessage: No email sent yet or the diagnostic settings of the email logic app are not configured.
